remarks: Map from the scalar division ring of the vector space to the scalar division ring of its closed kernel dual.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Mar-2015.)
statement:
hgmapval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapfval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapfval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hgmapfval.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hgmapfval.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmapfval.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapfval.s $e |- .xb = ( .s ` C ) $.
hgmapfval.m $e |- M = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapfval.i $e |- I = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapfval.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. Y /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapfval $p |- ( ph -> I = ( x e. B |-> ( iota_ y e. B A. v e. V ( M ` ( x .x. v ) ) = ( y .xb ( M ` v ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B v x y $.
$d K v x y $.
$d M v x y $.
$d U v x y $.
$d V v $.
$d W v x y $.
